next.title: Account Management: Managing Your Cell Phone Number

title: Account Management: Editing Your Account
body:
Account Management: Editing Your Account¶

If you would like to change your name or the email associated with your account, follow the steps below.

  1. Click on your profile (a circle with your initials or profile picture) located in the ribbon

  2. Click Manage Account

  3. Click Edit Account

  4. Click the field you want to edit (First name, last name, or email) and edit input. Alternatively, click the and retype entire field

  5. Repeat for each field you want to edit

  6. Click Save
